text.name: Zwei Knight's Greatsword Form
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 4 [Vibration] Count on self (max 2)

text.name: Ward
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max 3)
[WhenUse] If this unit is in [DefensiveStance], deal +50% damage
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 4 [DefenseUp] on self (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain +8 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WinDuel] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume all [Vibration] Count on self, and inflict the value of the Count consumed as [Vibration] on target. (max 10)
- Deal +(excess [Vibration] x 1.5)% damage (max 30%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] If this unit is in [DefensiveStance], trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce the target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Ward
text.desc:
[WhenUse] Gain 1 [DefenseUp] for every 2 [Vibration] Count on self (max <style="highlight">5)
[WhenUse] If this unit is in [DefensiveStance], deal +<style="highlight">70% damage
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 4 [DefenseUp] on self (max <style="highlight">4)
[WhenUse] Gain +<style="highlight">10 [Aggro] to this Skill Slot next turn
[WinDuel] Gain +3 [Vibration] Count
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume all [Vibration] Count on self, and inflict the value of the Count consumed as [Vibration] on target. (max <style="highlight">20)
- Deal +(excess [Vibration] x <style="highlight">5)% damage (max <style="highlight">50%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] If this unit is in [DefensiveStance], trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce the target's [Vibration] Count by 1

1081001.name: Shock-nullifying Greatsword
1081001.desc: At Combat Start, gain [DefenseUp] equal to [Vibration] Count on self (max 5)

1081011.name: Shock-nullifying Greatsword
1081011.desc:
At Combat Start, gain [DefenseUp] equal to [Vibration] Count on self (max 5)
- If this unit is in [DefensiveStance], double the amount of [DefenseUp] gained from the above effect.

1081021.name: Emergency Protection
1081021.desc: At Combat Start, compare each Identity's current HP to their HP at the start of the previous turn. Then, apply 2 [DefenseUp] to the Identity with the greatest disparity of HP values between turns.
